entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
